column5: Another river report i decided to bust out the noodle rod and get used to it cause the salmon and browns will be up the creeks soon enough.  Floated a worm as if it were a roe bag with wicked results.  Great day on the river went to a few spots around the Brantford area.  Double header  Caught a couple of mooneyes  And alot of big dirty suckers  Also got the $hit scraped outta my arm by some nettles but it was all worth it!
nice variety of fish.Never know what you will get fishing the Grand
nice fish ive never seen or caught a mooneye are they rare in the grand?
they are not rare in brantford u can catch them all day
